message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $400,000. Your turn!
You were too generous, let's try to get more for myself
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! Let's try to find a fair split. I'll give you $450,000 this time.
You're getting closer, but I want more!
I'm not going to give you all the power, Bob! Let's try to find a fair split. I'll give you $510,000 this time.
